Key achievements in my career include the NFT project along with successful brand launches that have boosted client visibility and engagement, and overcoming the challenge of reconciling diverse client inputs with creative vision.

My expertise lies in navigating the complexities of client relationships and transforming abstract ideas into impactful visual solutions. This skill set, complemented by my advanced academic background, positions me to provide substantial value to clients seeking to elevate their brand identity and design strategy.

I have 4+ years of experience designing and developing ecom stores on Shopify.

My process is simple:

- craft a moodboard

- understand client's inspiration

- design a lo-fi wireframe

- iterate to a final design

- develop the store on Shopify

- optimize on-page SEO

Further, I made sure to integrate analytics, support or any necessary plugins...

I've worked with various D2C founders mainly in lifestyle niche and my stores have scaled to 100k+ customers.

Below I have written about my best projects:-

One of my proudest achievements is the work I did for AristaCare (https://aristacare.co/). The founder approached me with a vision for a premium skincare brand that focused on natural ingredients. I started by creating a moodboard that captured the essence of luxury and nature. After several iterations of wireframes, we landed on a clean, minimalist design that really showcased the products.

Total Routine (https://totalroutine.co/) was a unique project in the fitness niche. The founder had a clear vision of creating a one-stop-shop for workout enthusiasts. I designed an intuitive category structure that made it easy for customers to find products based on their fitness goals.

I designed a bold, vibrant interface that reflected the energy of the brand. One of the key features I implemented was a quiz that helped customers find the right supplements for their needs.

Across all these projects, my focus on user experience, conversion optimization, and SEO best practices helped these stores scale rapidly.

work_description: I am a Video Editor with a zeal to create. I care about my clients needs, and try to always deliver the best.

FilPass - Workflows

FilPass is a Tamper-proof Document Issuance & Verification System. With already 30+ clients, each with user base of 1.5k the problem was data gathering from all users. They could not use google forms etc. because those did not suite our use case. Workflows is a JSON based versioned form builder. It is fast, secure and allows for a lot more features than basic form builders in market. The feature took around 2-3 months with rigorous brainstorming and ideation. Node.js ( Express.js ) built the robust backend support with Typescript. Frontend was made using React. Payment system was integrated which used PayMongo. Several other tools - VCS using git, hosting on AWS EC2 , Database on MongoDB etc. As a result, they had their own in-house form builder fit for our use case and versatile enough to be used by anyone. They gained 7+ clients after first release of Workflows. They also had potential clients who wanted to try workflows for Event management. This led into ideation of a new revenue channel by tapping into Philippines event market.

Filpass - Template Designer

Digitizing hard copy of certificates using the manual process takes weeks. They needed an interactive design tool to create digital certificates within browsers.

I was part of the 2 member team that built Template Designer (TD) which is a canvas design tool made using React. It uses role-based access management with 2 factor authentication which was implemented in BE using Node / TS.

It works collaboratively with FilPass system and Workflows creating a one stop solution for digital tamperproof certificates.

FPAS - Features updates and maintenance

FPAS is a member management system designed for a Singapore based client. It handles 6k+ students, their course curriculum and certificate payments.

I was the lead on this project with a team of 2 developers and 1 UI/UX.

The system needed periodic maintenance with Node and Angular upgrades. Also, I designed and implemented multiple client feature requests with the team as per their business requirements. Time to time hotfixes and handling of user issues.

I’m always eager to learn and grow, and I look forward to future opportunities to apply my skills.
